title: Update regarding LuxeBrands
story_body:
LuxeBrands (LUXE) has announced the appointment of Emily Chen as Vice President of Marketing, effective immediately. Ms. Chen will oversee the development and execution of the company's marketing strategy.

In a separate development, LuxeBrands has launched a new social media campaign, #LuxeSustainability, aimed at promoting the company's environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives. The campaign will run across multiple platforms, including Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

As part of its ongoing ESG efforts, LuxeBrands has also released an updated sustainability report, detailing the company's progress on reducing its carbon footprint and implementing sustainable practices throughout its supply chain.

In personnel news, LuxeBrands has announced the retirement of long-time employee, David Lee, who has served as Director of Operations since 2015. Mr. Lee will be succeeded by Rachel Patel, who has been with the company since 2018.

LuxeBrands has also announced the schedule for its upcoming investor events, including a presentation at the 2023 Consumer Goods Conference, to be held on March 15, 2023, at 10:00 AM EST.

All updates are effective as of 08:00 AM EST, March 1, 2023.
